${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:MysteriousStranger.NAME: Mysterious Stranger
${modID}:MysteriousStranger.FLAVOR: You feel yourself sniffle less, and your sore throat is gone.

${modID}:SuspiciousSalve.NAME: Suspicious Salve
${modID}:SuspiciousSalve.FLAVOR: This is definitely just monster juices. Ah well...
DESCRIPTIONS: Artifact has a #b50% chance to stick around.

${modID}:TheologyNotes.NAME: Theology Notes
${modID}:TheologyNotes.FLAVOR: Barely legible, these scraps appear to describe an intense hatred and,, 'Justice.'

${modID}:PaperUmbrella.NAME: Paper Umbrella
${modID}:PaperUmbrella.FLAVOR: This is wildly out of place. A good find, nevertheless.
DESCRIPTIONS: Sin increases Necrotic damage by 15% instead of 10%.

${modID}:PropheticScraps.NAME: Prophetic Scraps
${modID}:PropheticScraps.FLAVOR: Whoever the previous owner of these was, their 'piety' was rather, shall we say, 'Old Testament.'

${modID}:ReaperToken.NAME: Reaper Token
${modID}:ReaperToken.FLAVOR: That isn't meant to be in this world. Whoever put it here likes you. Hopefully.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain Artifact at the start of every turn. On pickup, gain Suspicious Salve, or a random rare relic if you have it.

${modID}:ConcealedRazor.NAME: Concealed Razor
${modID}:ConcealedRazor.FLAVOR: The blade is too short to be used for anything else.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 [E] at the start of each turn. Start combat Bleeding.

${modID}:VehicleVoltron.NAME: Vehicle Voltron
${modID}:VehicleVoltron.FLAVOR: This is hardly relevant to combat. It seems to have no mystical or chemical properties.
DESCRIPTIONS: You and all enemies start combat with 5 Regen.
